title: Setup
content:
Packages ``` sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo apt install vlc guake gimp smartmontools mplayer xbindkeys indicator-cpufreq caffeine xautomation build-essential curl adb git default-jdk gparted openjdk-8-jre openjdk-8-jdk unrar zip unzip p7zip-full p7zip-rar rar telegram-desktop gedit android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot gnome-tweak-tool ubuntu-restricted-extras nautilus-actions -y ```
Trim Storage ``` sudo fstrim -v / ```
Disable Swap ``` sudo gedit /etc/sysctl.conf ``` `vm.swappiness=1`
`xbindkeys` copy xbindkeysrc file and run: ``` xbindkeys ```
NodeJs ``` curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.35.3/install.sh | bash nvm install node npm install -g nativescript sudo update-alternatives --config java ``` ``` nvm ls nvm alias default xxxxxx ```
Alias ``` gedit .bashrc ``` `export ANDROID_HOME=/home/$USER/Android/Sdk/`
`export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools:$ANDROID_HOME/platforms-tools` ``` source ~/.bashrc ```
Cursor ``` https://www.gnome-look.org/p/1360254/ ```
